ImplementedSecurityControls: Access Control: `withdraw` and `Command` functions enforce `msg.sender == Owner` to restrict sensitive actions to the Owner.
Value Check in `GetFreebie`: The `msg.value > 1 ether` condition in `GetFreebie` adds minimal protection by ensuring only significant value transactions initiate the transfer.
FallbackFunctionality: A payable fallback function is implemented to allow the contract to accept Ether.
